name: Soil Test Kit
description: A simple chemical test kit that reveals exact soil pH and nutrient levels. Knowledge is power — but now you're expected to act on it.

effect.description: See soil pH and nutrient levels directly (previously hidden/inferred)

name: Weather Almanac
description: A dog-eared regional almanac with historical weather patterns. Lets you plan two weeks ahead instead of reacting week by week.

name: Hand Lens
description: A 10× magnifying loupe for inspecting leaf surfaces, soil texture, and tiny insects. Makes diagnosis observations more precise.

name: Drip Irrigation
description: A simple gravity-fed drip system that waters plots automatically. Saves time, but set the moisture level wrong and you'll overwater.

effect.description: Auto-water at set moisture level (saves 1 action/week)

name: Cold Frame
description: A low glass-topped box that traps warmth and shields tender plants from light frost. Won't help in a hard freeze.

name: Compost Bin
description: A three-bay composting system that improves over time. The longer you maintain it, the richer the finished compost becomes.

effect.description: Compost quality improves over runs (better organic matter boost)

name: Seed Library
description: A shared community seed catalog connecting you with other growers. More cultivars in your collection means more trading opportunities.

effect.description: Seed swap events become more frequent
